memberdef.argsstring: (const q15_t *pSrcA, uint32_t srcALen, const q15_t *pSrcB, uint32_t srcBLen, q15_t *pDst, uint32_t firstIndex, uint32_t numPoints)
memberdef.name: riscv_conv_partial_q15

parameterdescription.para: points to the first input sequence
length of the first input sequence
points to the second input sequence
length of the second input sequence
points to the location where the output result is written
is the first output sample to start with
is the number of output points to be computed

simplesect.para:
execution status
RISCV_MATH_SUCCESS : Operation successful
RISCV_MATH_ARGUMENT_ERROR : requested subset is not in the range [0 srcALen+srcBLen-2]
Refer to riscv_conv_partial_fast_q15() for a faster but less precise version of this function.
Refer to riscv_conv_partial_opt_q15() for a faster implementation of this function using scratch buffers.
